name: Rasikashray Sanskrutik Kala Va Bahuuddeshiya Sanstha
briefDescription: Rasikashraya a group of young activists engaged in social work has established the organization in 1999. Its area of operation is spread over twenty villages in Ghatanji, Kalamb and Yavatmal blocks of Yavatmal district. It works in partnership with beneficiaries by undertaking various developmental projects. It has a team of 16 devoted and dedicated  workers. It is engaged in integrated development of poor rural communities involving women, child, youth, farmers and especially the disables by drawing suitable programmes covering social, cultural, educational and human development aspects.

address: In front of Tehsil Office, Ghatanji
